reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great place in a very nice location in the White Mountains region. Four rooms and hosts are wonderful people. Made to order breakfast. Room that we had has excellent and very clean. The location is fine for touring summer, winter and, of course, fall season. Have WiFi access if needed./
reviews.title: Great place
